activities: The information will be used for HR purposes. Kratos requires the transfer of employee data to the United States, as the ERP database serves as the HR Information System and currently resides in Lanham, Maryland. Kratos will need EU employee data moved to the Lanham facility for consolidation of this database. Data is also needed for Project Accounting  and controls. Data is used to assign workforce to a project, which is used to control labor charging to projects. Project proposals and forecasts are developed at the employee level, thereby requiring visibility to labor rates.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President, General Counsel, Chief Compliance Officer and Corporate Secretary
recoursemech: Kratos will make every effort possible to resolve disputes internally. In the event this is not possible, data subjects with unresolved complaints are directed to send their complaints to the Data Protection Secretariat in Brussels, Belgium. Kratos agrees to comply with the rulings of the Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) regarding investigation and resolution of complaints.
